McMd::RingTetraRebridgeMove Class Reference
Monte Carlo Moves

Detailed Description

Molecule move that attempt the exchange of interior pieces of one close rings.

Analogous to the twist/untwist operations.

Definition at line 29 of file RingTetraRebridgeMove.h.

#include <RingTetraRebridgeMove.h>
